principles.name: Automate Standards
principles.description: Automate enforcement of standards. Linters, formatters, automated tests catch violations.
principles.falsification: When automate standards leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Continuous Delivery
principles.description: Keep software deployable throughout its lifecycle. Every change should be releasable at any time. If releasing is painful, do it more often until it's not. Automate everything: builds, tests, deployments. Use feature flags to decouple deployment from release. The goal is confidence: any commit can safely go to production.
principles.falsification: When continuous delivery leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Continuous Integration
principles.description: Integrate code frequently. Run automated tests on every integration. Find problems early.
principles.falsification: When continuous integration leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Deliverability
principles.description: Ability to safely release on demand. Automated pipelines, feature flags.
principles.falsification: When deliverability leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
